data.current_description: Translates input text, returning translated text.
data.description_suggestion: Translates input text from a source language to a target language. Accepts text content and language codes as query parameters. Returns a TranslationsListResponse containing the translated text, detected source language, and translation metadata. Supports batch translation of multiple text strings in a single request.
data.reasoning: Missing summary entirely. Description is too generic and lacks critical details about parameters (source/target language codes), expected inputs (text content), and response structure. AI agents need clarity on what parameters are required, what the response contains, and whether batch operations are supported.

data.current_description: Translates input text, returning translated text.
data.description_suggestion: Translates input text from a source language to a target language using a POST request. Accepts a TranslateTextRequest body containing text content, target language code, and optional source language code. Returns a TranslationsListResponse with translated text and translation metadata. Supports multiple text strings and automatic language detection when source language is not specified.

data.current_description: Detects the language of text within a request.
data.description_suggestion: Detects the language of provided text using language identification algorithms. Accepts text content as a query parameter. Returns a DetectionsListResponse containing an array of detected languages ranked by confidence, with the most likely language listed first. Useful for determining text language before translation or for language-specific processing.
data.reasoning: Missing summary entirely. Description is vague about input format (query parameter vs body), response structure (array of detections with confidence ranking), and use cases. data.current_description: Returns a list of supported languages for translation.
